text: "On My Mind" is a song performed by English production trio Disciples. The song was released in the United Kingdom as a digital download on 17 February 2017 through Parlophone and Warner Music Group. The song has peaked at number 15 on the UK Singles Chart. ==Music video== A music video to accompany the release of "On My Mind" was first released onto YouTube on 3 April 2017 at a total length of three minutes and twenty seconds.Disciples - On My Mind (Official Video) - YouTube ==Track listing== ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- |- |- |- |- ! scope="row"| Croatia (HRT) | 38 |- ! scope="row"| Germany (Deutsche Black Charts) | 50 |- ! scope="row"| Ireland (IRMA) | 19 |- ! scope="row"| Latvia (Latvijas Top 40) | 16 |- |- !scope="row"|Netherlands (Mega Top 50)"Lijst van 26-08-2017 - MEGA TOP 50" (in Dutch).
